title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 9, 2020
description: On this day 170 years ago, California became a U.S. state after being wrested from Mexico. It was the 31st state admitted to the Union, just before Minnesota.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 170 years ago, California became a U.S. state after being wrested from Mexico. It was the 31st state admitted to the Union, just before Minnesota.
